content: Hello, I hope this is the right place to ask this. I'm curious if there's a way to look at 'raw proof terms' as constructed by using tactics. I'm a bit new to this so I might be misunderstanding something, but can I somehow get the low-level, functional lean code from a higher-level proof? I'm not quite sure what I would be searching for in order to find this on google... Thanks!
